beers.name: Slim Hazy
comments: Light, bright floral hop nose just borders on perfume.

beers.name: Watermelon Session Ale
comments: More fruity notes of pineapple, mango, and assorted tropical fruit.

beers.name: Modelo Especial
comments: Well-balanced taste and light hop character with a crisp, clean finish. Modelo Especial is characterized by an orange blossom honey aroma with a hint of herb.
Really refreshing beer, I liked it.

beers.name: India Pale Ale
comments: Bright orange and tangerine notes pop on the tongue and quickly give way to rich tropical notes of pineapple.
Full-spectrum nose offers clear aromas at every frequency—citrus, tropical fruit, light malt.

beers.name: Harpoon IPA
comments: The aroma quickly evokes sweet orange, tangerine, and clementine, with creamy, gentle fruit notes that would be equally at home in something more hazy.
Orange-blossom nose, touches of vanilla and honey—smooth, round, cohesive.
